intro: Cymbispatha, commonly known as the velvetleaf, is a tropical plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves that are covered in a fine, velvety texture. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers that are typically greenish-white in color. Its fruit is a capsule that splits open to release numerous tiny seeds. Cymbispatha is often found in moist, disturbed habitats and is considered an invasive species in some regions.
